name: Hyperglycemic Nightmare
description:
Travel through your hyperglycemic dream to its end.

Short game  for https://itch.io/jam/beginners-circle-jam-2 , topic=candy.

Made with godot 3.2.2, linux and mac builds not tested.

Has more game mechanics than actual content.

Sounds made with Audacity and my mic, some 3d assets are godot's CSG thingies with simple materials, some are made with blender 2.90, some textures created/edited with gimp, some with built-in blender's texture paint feature.

Putting 'survival' as genre because that's what I was aiming for, this game has a little bit of several game mechanics, obviosly achieving full-featured survival wasn't possible in scope of my skills and the gamejam .
